ops.description: Bank[6][1] = getLastFieldMapId(); // wm does not count

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:27}); // {Cloud}
“I think I've heard it, too.”{PAUSE}“Then,
it was {Tifa}'s voice…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:11}); // {Cloud}
“Yeah…
I heard you calling me.”{PAUSE}“You were calling me back from the
consciousness in the Lifestream.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:12}); // {Cloud}
“After all, I promised
that if anything ever
happened to you, I'd come to help.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:15}); // {Cloud}
“I dunno…
But…”{PAUSE}“Whether they can or not, we still have
to do what we can.
And believe in ourselves…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:23}); // {Cloud}
“I'll find the answer someday.
4
As long as I keep trying.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:16}); // {Cloud}
“Someday we'll find the answer.
4
Right, {Tifa}?”{PAUSE}“That's what I learned from you
when I was in the Lifestream.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:13}); // {Tifa}
“{Cloud}…?
Do you think the stars
can hear us?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:25}); // {Tifa}
“Umm.
>
I guess you're right…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:21}); // {Tifa}
“{Cloud}…
Words aren't the only thing
that tell people what you're thinking…”

dialogStrings:
{Tifa}
“Everyone's gone…”

{Cloud}
“Yeah, we don't have anywhere or
anyone to go home to.”

{Tifa}
“You're right…”

{Tifa}
“But…I'm sure someday…
they'll come back, don't you think?”

{Cloud}
“Hmm…
I wonder…”

{Cloud}
“Everyone has something irreplaceable
they're holding on to…”{PAUSE}“But this time, our opponent…”

{Tifa}
“Hmm…But that's all right,
if no one comes back.”{PAUSE}“As long as we're together.
With you by my side, I'll never
give up no matter how bad it gets.”

{Cloud}
“…
{Tifa}…”

{Tifa}
“No matter how close we are now…
We were far apart before.”{PAUSE}“But when we were in the Lifestream
surrounded by all those screams of anguish,
I thought I heard your voice…”

{Tifa}
“…sniff…you probably don't remember this…”{PAUSE}“But deep in my heart
I heard you calling my name…
4
Or at least I thought I did…”

{Cloud}
“Yeah…
I heard you calling me.”{PAUSE}“You were calling me back from the
consciousness in the Lifestream.”

{Cloud}
“After all, I promised
that if anything ever
happened to you, I'd come to help.”

{Tifa}
“{Cloud}…?
Do you think the stars
can hear us?”

{Tifa}
“Do you think they see how
hard we're fighting for them?”

{Cloud}
“I dunno…
But…”{PAUSE}“Whether they can or not, we still have
to do what we can.
And believe in ourselves…”

{Cloud}
“Someday we'll find the answer.
4
Right, {Tifa}?”{PAUSE}“That's what I learned from you
when I was in the Lifestream.”

{Tifa}
“Yes…that's right…”

{Cloud}
“Hey {Tifa}…I…
*
There were so many things I
wanted to say to you.”

{Cloud}
“But now that we're together like this,
I don't know what to say…”{PAUSE}“I guess nothing's changed at all…
Funny, isn't it?”

“No…
No it isn't…”

{Tifa}
“{Cloud}…
Words aren't the only thing
that tell people what you're thinking…”

{Cloud}
“…”

{Cloud}
“I'll find the answer someday.
4
As long as I keep trying.”

{Cloud}
“We've got a big battle tomorrow,
we'd better get some sleep…”

{Tifa}
“Umm.
>
I guess you're right…”

{Cloud}
“I see…”

{Cloud}
“I think I've heard it, too.”{PAUSE}“Then,
it was {Tifa}'s voice…”
